title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: How Creativity Helped Shin Lim Stand Out—and Become a Las Vegas Headliner
items.description: The ‘America’s Got Talent’ winner shares wisdom for people trying to make a lasting impression.

items.title: India, EU reach ‘mother of all’ trade agreements after nearly 20 years of talks
items.description: The accord will see free trade on almost all goods between the 27 members of the EU and India, affecting nearly 2 billion people.

items.title: Minnesota launched a website to correct misinformation coming from the Department of Homeland Security

items.title: Do You Accept Crypto at Check-Out? New Data Shows a Rising Number of Businesses Do

items.title: Pinterest Quietly Reveals 14% Workforce Cut in SEC Filing as It Ramps Up AI Spending
items.description: The social media company joins a broader wave of layoffs amongst the AI boom. Some, however, aren’t convinced AI is the cause.

items.title: The Underrated Power of Curiosity
items.description: Curiosity fuels engagement, eases fear and strengthens connection in business and in life.
